description.english: Use your Techno's to buy a pack of POW Cards!
description.german: Benutze deine Technos, um ein Paket POW-Karten zu kaufen!
description.french: Achète un paquet de cartes POW en échange de Technos !
description.italian: Usa i tuoi Techno per comprare un pacchetto di carte POW!
description.spanish: ¡Usá tus technos para comprar un paquete de tarjetas POW!
description.russian: Используй Техно, чтобы купить набор карт!
description.brazilian: Use seu Techno’s para comprar um pacote de Cartas POW!

displayName.italian: OTTIENI LA CARTA POW DI K.O.
displayName.spanish: OBTENÉ UNA TARJETA POW DE K.O.
displayName.brazilian: GANHE A CARTA POW DO K.O.

description.english: WOW! My very own POW Card!
description.german: WOW! Meine ganz eigene POW-Karte!
description.french: Waouh ! Ma propre carte POW !
description.italian: WOW! Una carta POW tutta mia!
description.spanish: ¡GUAU! ¡Mi propia tarjeta POW!
description.russian: УХ ТЫ! Моя собственная карта!
description.brazilian: UAU! Minha própria Carta POW!

displayName.french: PAR LA PUISSANCE DU POWIE ZOWIE !

description.english: Unleash a Powie Zowie on a Boxmore bot!
description.german: Lass einen Powie Zowie auf einen Boxmore-Bot los!
description.french: Déclenche un Powie Zowie sur un robot de Boxmore !
description.italian: Scatena un Powie Zowie su un robot Boxmore!
description.spanish: ¡Liberá un Powie Zowie para que se encargue del robot Boxmore!
description.russian: Примени Суперприем на роботе Боксмора!
description.brazilian: Solte um Powie Zowie em um robô Boxmore!

description.english: Buy a Stat Booster and buff your stats!
description.german: Kauf einen Werte-Booster und bau deine Werte auf!
description.french: Achète un booster et améliore tes stats !
description.italian: Compra un potenziatore di statistiche per esaltare i tuoi dati statistici!
description.spanish: ¡Comprá un Potenciador de estadísticas y fortalecé tus estadísticas!
description.russian: Купи усилитель и улучши свои способности!
description.brazilian: Compre um Melhorador de Estatística e impulsione suas estatísticas!

description.english: Slam an enemy you just uppercutted with a charge punch!
description.german: Verpass einem Gegner einen geladenen Schlag, nachdem du ihn mit einem Uppercut getroffen hast!
description.french: Exécute une attaque chargée sur un ennemi, et enchaîne avec une attaque smashée !
description.italian: Sbatti contro un nemico a cui hai appena assestato un montante con un pugno caricato!
description.spanish: ¡Atacá a un enemigo al que le acabás de aplicar un gancho ascendente con un golpe poderoso!
description.russian: Нанеси врагу апперкот и сразу за этим - мощный удар!
description.brazilian: Balance um inimigo que você acabou de golpear no queixo com um soco explosivo!

description.english: Hit one Boxmore bot with two different Powie Zowies!
description.german: Triff einen Boxmore-Roboter mit zwei verschiedenen Powie Zowies!
description.french: Attaque un robot de Boxmore avec deux Powie Zowies différents !
description.italian: Colpisci un robot Boxmore con due diversi Powie Zowie!
description.spanish: ¡Golpeá a un robot Boxmore con dos Powie Zowies diferentes!
description.russian: Порази робота двумя разными суперприемами!
description.brazilian: Bata em um robô Boxmore com dois Powie Zowies diferentes!

description.english: Collect a Coolness stat point!
description.german: Sammle einen Coolness-Punkt!
description.french: Gagne un point de coolitude !
description.italian: Ottieni un punto statistico di Miticità!
description.spanish: ¡Recolectá un punto de estadística de Genialidad!
description.russian: Получи очко крутости!
description.brazilian: Colete um ponto de estatística de frieza!

displayName.brazilian: PAREM DE BATER EM VOCÊS MESMOS

description.english: Air-throw an enemy bot into another enemy bot!
description.german: Wirf einen gegnerischen Roboter aus der Luft in einen anderen gegnerischen Roboter!
description.french: Lance un robot de Boxmore dans un autre robot !
description.italian: Lancia in aria due robot nemici e falli scontrare fra di loro!
description.spanish: ¡Lanzá a un robot enemigo sobre otro!
description.russian: Швырни одного вражеского робота в другого!
description.brazilian: Arremesse um robô inimigo em outro robô inimigo!

description.english: Use Mr. Gar and Carol's Powie Zowies in the same combo!
description.german: Nutze Mr. Gar und Carols Powie Zowies in derselben Kombo!
description.french: Utilise les Powie Zowies de M. Gar et Carol dans le même combo !
description.italian: Usa i Powie Zowie di Mr. Gar e di Carol nella stessa combo!
description.spanish: ¡Usá los Powie Zowies de Mr. Gar y Carol en el mismo combo!
description.russian: Примени суперприемы мистера Гара и Кэрол в одном комбо!
description.brazilian: Use o Mr. Gar e os Powie Zowies da Carol no mesmo combo!

description.english: Use your fists to send a Jethro missile back at an enemy!
description.german: Benutze deine Fäuste, um eine Jethro-Rakete zurück zu einem Gegner zu schicken!
description.french: Renvoie un missile de Jethro vers un ennemi à l'aide de tes poings !
description.italian: Usa i tuoi pugni per rispedire un missile Jethro al nemico!
description.spanish: ¡Usá los puños para devolverle un misil Jethro al enemigo!
description.russian: Используй кулаки, чтобы отбить ракету Джетро обратно во врага!
description.brazilian: Use seu punho para enviar um míssil Jethro de volta a um inimigo!

description.english: Knock a kiss attack back at a Raymond!
description.german: Schlag einen Kuss-Angriff auf Raymond zurück!
description.french: Renvoie une attaque bisous à Raymond !
description.italian: Rispedisci con un pugno un attacco con bacio a Raymond!
description.spanish: ¡Bloqueá un ataque de beso de Raymond!
description.russian: Направь поцелуйную атаку обратно на Реймонда!
description.brazilian: Devolva um ataque de beijo a um Raymond!

description.english: Smash your way to a 20 hit combo!
description.german: Schlag dir deinen Weg zu einer 20-Treffer-Kombo!
description.french: Réalise un combo de 20 coups !
description.italian: Fatti strada a colpi di combo da 20!
description.spanish: ¡Repartí puñetazos hasta alcanzar un combo de 20 golpes!
description.russian: Нанеси подряд 20 ударов!
description.brazilian: Esmague do seu jeito um combo de 20 ataques!

displayName.brazilian: TRÊS SUJEITOS, UM GOLPE NO QUEIXO

description.english: Hit 3 enemy bots with one single uppercut!
description.german: Triff 3 gegnerische Roboter mit einem einzigen Uppercut!
description.french: Frappe 3 robots ennemis d'un seul uppercut !
description.italian: Colpisci 3 robot nemici con un singolo montante!
description.spanish: ¡Golpeá a 3 robots enemigos con un solo gancho ascendente!
description.russian: Порази трех роботов одним апперкотом!
description.brazilian: Bata em 3 robôs inimigos com um único golpe no queixo!

description.english: Collect 50 microchips from stunned Boxmore baddies!
description.german: Sammle 50 Mikrochips von betäubten Boxmore-Schurken!
description.french: Récupère 50 puces électroniques de robots de Boxmore sonnés !
description.italian: Colleziona 50 microchip da cattivoni Boxmore storditi!
description.spanish: ¡Recolectá 50 microchips de los estupefactos robots Boxmore!
description.russian: Собери 50 микрочипов с поверженных роботов Боксмора!
description.brazilian: Colete 50 microchips dos atordoados bandidos de Boxmore!

description.english: Finish a battle without taking a single hit!
description.german: Schließe einen Kampf ab, ohne getroffen zu werden!
description.french: Termine un combat sans encaisser le moindre coup !
description.italian: Completa una battaglia senza incassare un solo colpo!
description.spanish: ¡Terminá una batalla sin recibir golpes!
description.russian: Заверши бой, не получив ни одного удара!
description.brazilian: Termine uma batalha sem dar um único golpe!

description.english: Save up 50 Technos!
description.german: Spar dir 50 Technos auf!
description.french: Économise 50 Technos !
description.italian: Colleziona 50 Techno!
description.spanish: ¡Ahorra 50 technos!
description.russian: Собери 50 Техно!
description.brazilian: Economize até 50 Technos!

description.english: Collect all of the POW Cards in the game!
description.german: Sammle alle POW-Karten im Spiel!
description.french: Récupère toutes les cartes POW du jeu !
description.italian: Colleziona tutte le carte POW in gioco!
description.spanish: ¡Coleccioná todas las tarjetas POW en el juego!
description.russian: Собери все карты в игре!
description.brazilian: Colete todas as Cartas POW no jogo!

description.english: Max out your Strength, Agility and Coolness stats!
description.german: Maximiere deine Stärke, Wendigkeit und Coolness!
description.french: Améliore au maximum ta force, ton agilité et ta coolitude !
description.italian: Eleva al massimo la tua Forza, Agilità e Miticità!
description.spanish: ¡Llevá al límite tus estadísticas de Fuerza, Agilidad y Genialidad!
description.russian: Доведи свою Силу, Ловкость и Крутость до максимума!
description.brazilian: Maximize suas estatísticas de Força, Agilidade e Frieza!

description.english: Get a super-long combo that is 30 hits or more!
description.german: Erziele eine superlange Kombo mit 30 oder mehr Treffern!
description.french: Réalise un combo d'au moins 30 coups !
description.italian: Ottieni una lunghissima combo composta da 30 o più colpi!
description.spanish: ¡Obtené un combo súper largo de 30 golpes o más!
description.russian: Создай супердлинное комбо из 30 или более ударов!
description.brazilian: Ganhe um super combo que tem 30 golpes ou mais!

description.english: Enter a correct secret code into the POW Card Machine!
description.german: Gib einen korrekten Geheimcode in die POW-Kartenmaschine ein!
description.french: Entre un code secret correct dans la machine à cartes POW !
description.italian: Inserisci un codice segreto esatto nella macchina delle carte POW!
description.spanish: ¡Introducí un código secreto correcto en la Máquina de tarjetas POW!
description.russian: Введи правильный тайный код в карточном автомате!
description.brazilian: Digite um código secreto correto na Máquina de Cartas POW!

displayName.english: All Is Well in the Plaza
displayName.french: TOUT EST BIEN QUI FINIT BIEN
displayName.russian: ВСЕ, ЧТО НАМ НУЖНО, ЭТО ПЛАЗА

description.english: Complete KO's epic quest and defeat Lord Boxman!
description.german: Schließe KOs episches Abenteuer ab und besiege Lord Boxman!
description.french: Termine la quête épique de K.O. et terrasse Lord Boxman !
description.italian: Completa l’epica missione di K.O. e sconfiggi Lord Boxman!
description.spanish: ¡Completá la épica misión de K.O. y derrotá a Lord Boxman!
description.russian: Заверши эпический квест К.О. и победи Лорда Боксмана!
description.brazilian: Complete a busca épica do KO e defenda Lord Boxman!

description.english: Use the same Powie Zowie 12 times in one battle
description.german: Benutze denselben Powie Zowie 12-mal in einem Gefecht
description.french: Utilise le même Powie Zowie 12 fois dans un combat.
description.italian: Usa lo stesso Powie Zowie 12 volte in una battaglia
description.spanish: Usá el mismo Powie Zowie 12 veces en una misma batalla.
description.russian: Используй один и тот же Суперприем 12 раз за бой
description.brazilian: Use o mesmo Powie Zowie 12 vezes em uma batalha

description.english: Chat with all the peeps in the plaza!
description.german: Sprich mit allen Leuten in der Plaza!
description.french: Discute avec tous les personnages de Plaza !
description.italian: Chiacchiera con tutte le persone nel Plaza!
description.spanish: ¡Charlá con todas las personas que se encuentran en Plaza!
description.russian: Поболтай со всеми друзьями на площади!
description.brazilian: Bata papo com todas as pessoas no plaza!

description.english: Battle waves of bots in FIGHT! Mode
description.german: Tritt in KÄMPFT!-Modus gegen Wellen von Robotern an!
description.french: Affronte des vagues de robots en mode Combat !
description.italian: Combatti contro ondate di robot in COMBATTI! Modalità
description.spanish: ¡Peleá contra ejércitos de robots en LUCHA! Modo
description.russian: Сражайся с волнами роботов! Режим
description.brazilian: Ondas de batalhas de robôs em LUTA! Modo
